title: NFL Week 2 Preseason Full Recap (Football 08/20)
description:
Will Brinson is joined by John Breech and Sean Wagner to break down Week 2 of the NFL Preseason. Is the new helmet rule causing problems for the league that could linger? Is roughing the passer going to be a THING this season? Did Baker Mayfield and Josh Allen make their case to start in Week 1? Would you rather have Jimmy Garoppolo or Patrick Mahomes? Should the Jaguars trade for Teddy Bridgewater? Can the Bengals offense be good? Is the Zack Martin injury a problem for Dallas? How did Deshaun Watson look? Can the Titans offense be good?  Is Trey Burton a top 10 tight end? All these questions answered plus much more.
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy
